We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Employment Type: Full-time

	Oversee the entire client journey, from inquiry to post-delivery follow-up.
	?Ensure seamless communication and satisfaction at all client touchpoints.
	Coordinate events from post-planning to final delivery
	Ensure seamless operations during events and in the studios
	?Manage client feedback, complaints, and resolution processes professionally.
	?Train and supervise front-desk/client service and customer-facing staff to ensure excellence
	Collaborate with the creative, marketin and operations teams to meet client expectations and deliver a memorable client experience
	Track client satisfaction metrics and suggest improvements.
	Come up with various strategies to grow revenue and improve customer satisfaction.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Communications, Business, or related fields.
	?Minimum of 2 years of experience in customer service or client relations (preferably in a creative or service industry).

	?Strong problem-solving ability and emotional intelligence.
	?A passion for client satisfaction and brand loyalty.


Salary
N103,000 monthly.

  "description": "Verstand Resources - Our client, a medical spa, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Office Patient Concierge

Job Location:&nbsp;Wuse 11, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Our client, a medical spa is seeking a Front Office Patient Concierge&mdash;a refined, charismatic, and seasoned professional who will be the first and most consistent point of contact for their high-value clients.


Key Responsibilities


	Warmly welcome and escort clients, offering a polished, spa-like check-in and check-out experience.
	Manage all appointment scheduling, confirmations, follow-ups, and rescheduling with tact and precision.
	Act as the face and voice of the brand, ensuring every interaction reflects elegance, discretion, and warmth.
	Facilitate seamless communication between clients and clinical staff to ensure comfort, clarity, and consistency.
	Educate clients on service options, packages, and post-care&mdash;encouraging informed decisions and repeat visits.
	Proactively track consultation outcomes, encourage bookings, and follow up with leads to boost conversion rates.
	Maintain accurate client records, CRM updates, and follow-up logs to ensure exceptional service continuity.
	Monitor the ambience and presentation of the front office, ensuring it aligns with a luxury environment.
	Anticipate client needs and preferences for a personalized and anticipatory service experience.
	Handle VIP requests, confidential information, and sensitive concerns with the highest level of professionalism.


Requirements


	Highly experienced in a client-facing role within a luxury medical, aesthetics, hospitality, or wellness setting (3+ years preferred).
	Knowledge of medical aesthetic treatments such as Botox, fillers, skin rejuvenation, or body sculpting.
	Polished, articulate, and emotionally intelligent, with a natural ability to connect with and influence high-end clients.
	Deep understanding of client conversion, upselling, and maintaining long-term relationships.
	Tech-savvy, with familiarity in scheduling tools, client management software, and CRM systems.
	Strong attention to details, service precision, and a white-glove approach to every task.
	Confident, solution-oriented, and thrives in fast-paced, premium environments.


Salary
N150,000 monthly.&nbsp;

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@verstandresources.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the email subject.

	Warmly welcome and escort clients, offering a polished, spa-like check-in and check-out experience.
	Manage all appointment scheduling, confirmations, follow-ups, and rescheduling with tact and precision.
	Act as the face and voice of the brand, ensuring every interaction reflects elegance, discretion, and warmth.
	Facilitate seamless communication between clients and clinical staff to ensure comfort, clarity, and consistency.
	Educate clients on service options, packages, and post-care—encouraging informed decisions and repeat visits.
	Proactively track consultation outcomes, encourage bookings, and follow up with leads to boost conversion rates.
	Maintain accurate client records, CRM updates, and follow-up logs to ensure exceptional service continuity.
	Monitor the ambience and presentation of the front office, ensuring it aligns with a luxury environment.
	Anticipate client needs and preferences for a personalized and anticipatory service experience.
	Handle VIP requests, confidential information, and sensitive concerns with the highest level of professionalism.


Requirements


	Highly experienced in a client-facing role within a luxury medical, aesthetics, hospitality, or wellness setting (3+ years preferred).
	Knowledge of medical aesthetic treatments such as Botox, fillers, skin rejuvenation, or body sculpting.
	Polished, articulate, and emotionally intelligent, with a natural ability to connect with and influence high-end clients.
	Deep understanding of client conversion, upselling, and maintaining long-term relationships.
	Tech-savvy, with familiarity in scheduling tools, client management software, and CRM systems.
	Strong attention to details, service precision, and a white-glove approach to every task.
	Confident, solution-oriented, and thrives in fast-paced, premium environments.


Salary
N150,000 monthly. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@verstandresources.com using the Job Position as the email subject.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Employment Type: Full-time  (on site)

Job Overview
     

            
    




	The Media & Communications Manager will play a crucial role in shaping and fostering a vibrant online community around our brands and products.
	This person will be responsible for creating engaging and authentic contents, building relationships with our audience and leveraging various social media platforms to enhance brand visibility and community engagements.


Responsibilities and Duties


	Developing and implementing a community engagement strategy aligned with the brand while fostering a sense of community with the audience/customers.
	Creating and curating compelling video contents featuring personal interactions showcasing and speaking about our products for social media, forums, and communities.
	Monitoring social media trends and industry developments to identify opportunities for engagement and content creation.
	Identifying and collaborating with influencers and brand ambassadors to extend reach and strengthen community.
	Maintaining brand presence and engagements and responding timely to community inquiries, comments, and feedback.
	Organizing and executing online/offline community events or campaigns, webinars and challenges while encouraging participation to foster community interactions and loyalty.


Job Requirements


	Must have at least an HND qualification.
	Must be able to feature in creative video contents.
	Must have proven experience as a social media manager, community manager or a similar role.
	Must have good understanding on the use of social media.
	Must have an exceptional communication and interpersonal skill.

	Must possess good time management skills.
	Must live within Isolo/Ago/Festac and environs.
